formattedAddress: 2 United Nations Plaza, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2 United Nations Plaza, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Rosely is an amazing instructor! She really fosters an environment to completely submerse yourself into Brazilian culture while taking her course. Her technique properly prepares you for conversational Portuguese for any planned trips to Brazil as well as preparing you for proper professional conversations related to business as well! Very well rounded and fun course :)

text.text: Rosely is an amazing instructor! She really fosters an environment to completely submerse yourself into Brazilian culture while taking her course. Her technique properly prepares you for conversational Portuguese for any planned trips to Brazil as well as preparing you for proper professional conversations related to business as well! Very well rounded and fun course :)

originalText.text: Do not recommend taking a Portuguese lesson class here. Please note that my experience is limited to the Brazilian Portuguese class with Rosely. It was very disorganized and there seemed to be no structure in terms of learning the language besides watching videos in class ( I can do that on my own). The teacher did not explain grammar properly or even verb conjugation and there was no syllabus. If we got a hw assignment using material we did not have, the teacher would say she would send and never did. I also never received the e textbook that the website states is part of the $300 tuition, despite emailing for a few weeks. The teacher said she would get to it or ignored my requests all together. Every class you go to, the people who attend also somehow seem to change. She also never started class on time because she would wait for more people to come and before you knew it, a half hour of the 1.5 time passed. If your goal is to learn Portuguese, save your money for a more serious school or even duolingo. Shocked this is part of the UN.

originalText.text: Been working with PoLI for 2 years now and I could not be more happy with my experience. Rosely is a wonderful teacher and my experience with her has been phenomenal. I feel like I’m able to actually speak the language! After studying language for so long but not being able to speak this is a huge improvement. Kind, clear, flexible and fun. Nothing but good things to say about the Portuguese Language Institute. If you want to learn to speak Portuguese this school is a must!

originalText.text: I had a great experience taking beginner-level classes with Rosely for about three months. She was extremely friendly and was an excellent instructor: the lessons were effective and she encouraged us to speak in Portuguese as much as possible early on. The class size was small and the students were a great group of people. I learned a lot and had fun at the same time.

originalText.text: I was very pleased with the Beginner European Portuguese class that I took here.  Patricia is a very good teacher and makes sure that her students are pronouncing the words correctly.
